title: Godrej sets up finance services arm - Times of India
content:
1. Godrej sets up finance services arm  Times of India
  2. Godrej to integrate NBFC, housing finance arms in new entity  Economic Times
  3. Godrej Industries Announces Launch Of Financial Services Arm Godrej Capital, To Invest ₹1,500 Cr  Mint
  4. Godrej Capital will be a meaningful part of the group's scale in 5-10 years: Pirojsha Godrej, chairman – Godrej Capital and Manish Shah, MD & CEO – Godrej Housing Finance  The Financial Express
  5. Godrej Ind to expand interest in financial services via Godrej Capital  Business Standard
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: India Business News: MUMBAI: Godrej Industries has set up a financial services subsidiary company, Godrej Capital (GCL), which will be the holding entity of Godrej Housing.
